overview:
Co-Founder of MiKandi LLC, the world’s first and largest mobile app store for adults. MiKandi represents the leading cross-platform mobile application and digital content marketplace without censorship or restrictions. MiKandi functions as a dynamic hub that allows developers to market, monetize and deliver uncensored content to mobile devices. Through our online store at MiKandi.com or the MiKandi Mobile Market, our single-install mobile client, users are able to purchase mobile applications and related digital content through in-app purchases.

Product designer, marketing manager and PR of InnerVibe, Inc., specializing in adult sexual health products. InnerVibe is a brand that believes in enforcing a positive and healthy outlook on sexuality. Our line up of pleasure products are designed specifically to be female and couple friendly and advocate intimate, natural pleasure. InnerVibe advocates a positive approach to sensual adventures through social media and community building on Facebook, Twitter and our InnerVibe website by bringing sensual discovery into everyday conversations.

Specialties

  • Product Research and Development/Product Design
  • Branding and Identity
  • Marketing
  • Advertising
  • Public Relations in adult/mature sector
  • Business Development
